backend/main.mo: Stores and validates contact form submissions, assigning incremental IDs and exposing submit and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color tokens, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component wiring all site sections, smooth scrolling, header, footer, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Responsive footer with logo, quick links, contact details, and dynamic year plus attribution.
frontend/src/components/GradientCTAButto: Reusable gradient-styled CTA button extending the base Button component with brand colors.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders an about section with text, an image, and a CTA button that scrolls to the services section.
frontend/src/components/sections/ClientR: Displays a grid of client result images and a CTA button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides a contact form with validation, submission via a mutation hook, and static contact info cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows a hero banner with headline text, decorative graphics, and a CTA button that scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Portfol: Renders a portfolio grid of project cards with metrics and a CTA button to view more, scrolling to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service cards with icons and descriptions plus a CTA button that scrolls to the portfolio section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Displays testimonial cards with quotes, avatars, and a CTA button leading to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Layout wrapper giving sections consistent spacing, titles, and gradient underline accents.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Sticky responsive header with scroll‑spy highlighting, smooth anchor navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting a contact form via an actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merging helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and container settings using custom CSS variable–based palettes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, images, and architectural notes for the SolviroStudio portfolio site.
